question: How to buy a product?
answer: You can buy products by adding them to your cart and completing the checkout process securely.

question: How long is the delivery process?
answer: Delivery usually takes 2–5 working days depending on your location.

question: How to request a refund?
answer: You can request a refund within 7 days through your order history page or by contacting customer support.

question: Is Cash on Delivery available?
answer: Yes, Cash on Delivery (COD) is available for selected regions and products.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: You can track your order from the “My Orders” page after logging in.

question: How to cancel an order?
answer: You can cancel your order before it is shipped by visiting the order details page.

question: Can I return a product?
answer: Yes, returns are accepted within 14 days if the item is unused and in original condition.

question: Do I need an account to place an order?
answer: You can browse products without an account, but you must sign up or log in to complete a purchase.

question: What payment methods are accepted?
answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, e-wallets, and COD for eligible areas.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Yes, all payments are processed through encrypted gateways to ensure your information is safe.

question: How can I contact customer service?
answer: You can reach customer service via live chat, email, or the Contact Us page available on our website.

question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
answer: Please contact customer support within 3 days of receiving your order. We will assist with return or replacement.

question: Can I change my delivery address after placing an order?
answer: If your order hasn’t shipped yet, you can update the delivery address in the order details page or by contacting support.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Currently, we ship within Indonesia only. International shipping will be available soon.

question: Are there shipping fees?
answer: Shipping fees vary depending on your location and will be shown during checkout.

question: Can I get free shipping?
answer: Yes, we offer free shipping for orders above Rp500.000 or during special promotions.

question: How to apply a discount code?
answer: Enter your discount or promo code during checkout in the “Voucher” section before payment.

question: Can I combine multiple discount codes?
answer: Only one discount code can be applied per order unless otherwise stated in the promotion terms.

question: What if my payment fails?
answer: If your payment fails, please check your bank account balance or try another payment method. You can also contact support for help.

question: Do you provide gift wrapping?
answer: Yes, gift wrapping is available for an additional fee at checkout.

question: Can I pre-order an item?
answer: Yes, some items allow pre-ordering. The estimated shipping date will be displayed on the product page.

question: How do I know if a product is in stock?
answer: The product availability is shown on each product page. Out-of-stock items cannot be added to your cart.

question: What happens if an item is out of stock after I order?
answer: If the item becomes unavailable, we will notify you and process a full refund automatically.

question: Do you provide invoices for purchases?
answer: Yes, invoices are automatically sent via email after your order is confirmed.

question: Can I change my order after it’s placed?
answer: Once the order is confirmed, modifications are limited. Contact support as soon as possible.

question: Do you offer express delivery?
answer: Yes, express delivery is available for selected cities with additional fees.

question: How to check my refund status?
answer: You can track your refund status from the “Refund Requests” section in your account.

question: When will I receive my refund?
answer: Refunds are usually processed within 3–7 business days after approval.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: Click “Sign Up” on the top-right corner, enter your details, and verify your email to activate your account.

question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
answer: Click “Forgot Password?” on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.

question: Can I update my personal information?
answer: Yes, go to your profile settings and update your details anytime.

question: Do you have a loyalty or membership program?
answer: Yes, registered members earn points for every purchase that can be redeemed for discounts.

question: How can I subscribe to the newsletter?
answer: You can subscribe by entering your email address at the bottom of our homepage to receive updates and promotions.

question: Is there a mobile app available?
answer: Yes, our official mobile app is available on Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

question: How do I report a technical issue on the website?
answer: If you experience errors, please report the issue via our “Feedback” form or contact our support team.

question: Can I share my feedback about a product?
answer: Yes, you can leave a rating and review on the product page after receiving your order.

question: How do I know if a product is authentic?
answer: We only sell genuine products sourced directly from verified brands and distributors.

question: What are your operating hours?
answer: Our customer support operates from 08.00–22.00 WIB, Monday to Sunday.

question: Do you offer installment payment options?
answer: Yes, installment options are available for select banks and payment partners.

question: What if I don't receive my order?
answer: If your order hasn’t arrived after the estimated delivery time, please contact support to investigate.
